snippet: New privileges will include receiving military identification cards and gym access, but more expansive benefits, like health care, were not granted.
abstract: Pentagon expands benefits to same-sex partners of military personnel to include range of services offered at various posts and bases.
lead_paragraph: New privileges will include receiving military identification cards and gym access, but more expansive benefits, like health care, were not granted.

headline.seo: Partners of Gay Military Personnel Are Granted Benefits
headline.main: Partners of Gays in Service Are Granted Some Benefits
headline.print_headline: Partners of Gays in Service Are Granted Some Benefits
